text: Yazdegerd, Yazdgerd, Yazdigird, or Yazdagird (Inscriptional or Yazdgird, Yazdkirt; Yazdgerd; Yazdijird) may refer to: *Yazdegerd I (r. 399–420), Sasanian King of Persia *Yazdegerd II (r. 438–457), Sasanian King, son of Bahram V *Yazdegerd III (r. 632–651), last king of the Sasanian Empire *Yazdagird (Bavandid ruler) (r. 1271–1300), ruler in Mazandaran *Yazdgerd, Lorestan, a village in Lorestan Province, Iran ==See also== * Yazata, also sometimes spelled Yazad
title: Yazdegerd
